actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To authorize the District of Columbia to enter into multi-year agreements to carry out certain public-private partnership projects and make payments for the termination costs under such agreements in any fiscal year, and for other purposes.
short_title: District of Columbia Public-Private Partnerships Home Rule Act

summary.text:
District of Columbia Public-Private Partnerships Home Rule Act

This bill provides authority for the District of Columbia government to enter into multi-year public-private partnership agreements and make payments for the termination costs associated with such agreements.

titles.title: District of Columbia Public-Private Partnerships Home Rule Act

To authorize the District of Columbia to enter into multi-year agreements to carry out certain public-private partnership projects and make payments for the termination costs under such agreements in any fiscal year, and for other purposes.
